subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490 Good afternoon, Attached please find Warden N'Diaye's response to Your Honor's inquiry. Please let us know if you need further information. body:
Good afternoon,
Attached please find Warden N'Diaye's response to Your Honor's inquiry. Please let
us know if you need further information.
Thank you,
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)83 6 ii
f: (646)836-7665
>>> <BermanNYSDChambers@nysd.uscourts.gov> 8/12/2019 12:47 PM >>>
